recipes.name: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, pecorino cheese, black pepper
recipes.instructions: Boil the spaghetti. In a separate pan, cook the pancetta. Mix the eggs and cheese. Combine all ingredients and season with pepper.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, onions, tomatoes, garlic, curry powder, coconut milk
recipes.instructions: Saut√© onions and garlic. Add chicken and cook until golden brown. Add tomatoes and curry powder. Pour in coconut milk and simmer until chicken is cooked.
